assets.name: fist
assets.room_description: What's your fist doing not attached to your hand?
assets.description: You know it like the back of your hand.

assets.name: t-shirt
assets.room_description: Your t-shirt is on the floor.
assets.description: A band t-shirt of a punk band you have never listened to before. Poser.

assets.name: Paolyta-B
assets.room_description: A tall brown bottle of Paolyta-B sits next to some small, white, plastic cups.
assets.description: 保力達-B. When combined with the proper canned soda, this bottle contains all the nutrients need for an eight-hour day of labor.

assets.name: green ooze
assets.room_description: There is some green slime on the floor.
assets.description: The green ooze seems to be multiplying. Soon your backpack will be full of it.

assets.name: chicken essence
assets.room_description: A bottle of chicken essence sits on a shelf, its label beckoning you to take just one sip.
assets.description: Welcome to the 21st century, a whole chicken boiled down to a liquid that fits in a bottle smaller than a babyfood jar.

assets.name: pocket lint
assets.room_description: You see some gray fuzz on the floor.
assets.description: You can discern the remains of a receipt in the midst of this gray fuzz. Who knows, you could be the winner of 2 million dollars.

assets.name: crusty apron
assets.room_description: There is a crusty apron hanging on a hook.
assets.description: This apron was once made of cotton. Now it is mostly made of hardened fryer grease, betel nut juice, and dried sweat. You feel like it can probably protect you from some attacks.

assets.name: utility coveralls
assets.room_description: A pair of neatly-folded, school-bus yellow coveralls have been placed on a chair.
assets.description: A pair of coveralls made of kevlar-like material. You feel like they could take a beating. There is a patch with the stylized characters 台電 placed between some lightning bolts. TAIPOWER is printed on the back.

assets.name: riot armor
assets.room_description: There is a set of riot armor displayed on a mannequin in front of the west wall.
assets.description: Padded, black riot armor. A large insignia on the front displays a twelve pointed white star on a blue field.

assets.name: baseball bat
assets.room_description: A baseball bat is propped up in the corner next to the door to the north.
assets.description: A maple baseball bat. Its various gouges and dents suggest that it's not used for batting practice.

assets.name: shiv
assets.room_description: An object that resembles a shiv is lying on the floor.
assets.description: Somehow, not only did this ghoul's tibia fracture in such a way to form a passable blade, but the remaining skin on the dull end has already dried to form a fine leather handle.

assets.name: machete
assets.room_description: A rusty machete is mounted on an ornate plaque on the south wall.
assets.description: The duct tape handle and rusty blade belie the keen edge and superior balance of this weapon.

assets.name: katana
assets.room_description: The boss's katana is lying next to his body.
assets.description: Forged by the... Heck, I don't know where this thing was made. I just know it's badass!

assets.name: green key
assets.room_description: A green key is on the floor.
assets.description: The key has a green bow (https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/bow , noun (2), definition 4) and a square blade indentations on each face.

assets.name: red key
assets.room_description: A red key is on the floor.
assets.description: This key has a red bow and a roughly triangular blade.
